title: Oru Manam Upcoming Song From Dhruva Natchathiram Tamil Movie
stanzas:
<div>
‘Oru Manam’, is the first single from Dhruva Natchathiram Tamil Movie and is composed by Harrish Jeyaraj.
Though first single name as "Oru Manam" was announced long before there is no updates from Dhiruva Natchathiram team about the song till now.
Yet we have a cool trailer that have millions of eye as it is like a hollywood movie trailer. Expectations are set high.

A moment from ‘Oru manam’, the first single from Dhruva natchathiram which by the way is releasing very soon ! https://t.co/KrexiqiKHc
— Gauthamvasudevmenon (@menongautham) June 25, 2018
A post shared by Gautham Vasudev Menon (@gauthamvasudevmenon) on Jun 23, 2018 at 4:20am PDT
